alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Johnson; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 8:29AM CDT until April 04 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Buchanan County in northeastern Iowa... Northwestern Johnson County in east central Iowa... Southeastern Benton County in east central Iowa... Northwestern Jones County in east central Iowa... Southwestern Delaware County in northeastern Iowa... Linn County in east central Iowa... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 829 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cedar Rapids, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Marion, Hiawatha, Robins, Toddville, Squaw Creek Park and Marion Airport around 840 AM CDT. Alburnett, Whittier and Lafayette around 845 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Central City, Waubeek, Linn County Fairgrounds, Paris, Pinicon Ridge Park, Howard H Cherry Scout Reservation, Coggon, Ryan, Prairieburg, Buffalo Creek Park and Robinson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Johnson; Jones; Linn
